# WKApplicationState.background

**Case**

The Watch app is running in the background.

## Declaration

```swift
case background
```

## Discussion

The system can wake suspended apps in the background. It can also launch apps that are not running in the background to perform background tasks.

## Constants

- **WKApplicationState.active**: The Watch app is running in the foreground and currently receiving events.
- **WKApplicationState.inactive**: The Watch app is running in the foreground, but is not yet responding to actions from controls or gestures.
